description:
Defeat The Scourge in an alternate Wraeclast to create powerful corrupted items.

This is the default Path of Exile league.

Defeat The Scourge in an alternate Wraeclast to create powerful corrupted items.

A character killed in Hardcore Scourge becomes a Standard character.
